Package com.microsoft.azure.management.network

Interface PacketCapture

All Superinterfaces:
HasId, HasInner<com.microsoft.azure.management.network.implementation.PacketCaptureResultInner>, HasName, Indexable
@Beta public interface PacketCapture extends HasInner<com.microsoft.azure.management.network.implementation.PacketCaptureResultInner>, HasName, HasId, Indexable
Client-side representation of Packet capture object, associated with Network Watcher.

    • bytesToCapturePerPacket

      int bytesToCapturePerPacket()
      Returns:
      the number of bytes captured per packet, the remaining bytes are truncated.
